name: Super Bus Squad 3
description:
The Super Bus Squad are on the run from an interdimensional police force determined to wipe Desert Bus for Hope from the multiverse.

With all their science and technology they are unable to defeat this force, and have hopped to a reality home to the buffest, swolest versions of themselves and recruited them to take on this evil with pure brute force.

Created for and alongside the Desert Bus For Hope 2022 Charity Marathon

Boss music by dillatont

Check out the post-jam versions of the previous games Super Bus Squad and Super Bus Squad 2

Check out the other games I've made for previous Desert Bus for Hope Game Jams
